data.app_name: The Pirate Queen with Lucy Liu
data.description:
Embark on an epic journey through the turbulent waters of history in "The Pirate Queen", with Lucy Liu üåü

![{"height":224,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38982662_7513468888773292_7586277367396825871_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=4KiZ6etCbfsQ7kNvgGvNjGB&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAczTpA7Bir2Dsdpg5McaS0M2qAbiywvaxiwL2OHH8bbA&oe=66FFD21C)

Step into the boots of the legendary pirate Cheng Shih and see if you have what it takes to become history's most powerful pirate  üè¥‚Äç‚ò†Ô∏è


![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39036653_1456869748359051_7076517034930849202_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=BiLbHyuyRygQ7kNvgHHqrX7&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYANWkjpc-spaT1CXjr2KGW8RpFtIbwqpBNU0wAwSR2hTQ&oe=66FFDBA4)


Travel back in time with this immersive story, perfect for explorers of all ages. Whether you're seeking a fresh adventure, yearning to escape into another world, or eager to unearth a hidden gem from history, this legend is for you.

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39003263_961033948683270_8273646164126363713_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=7Hv4t70Cl7AQ7kNvgG7iyKA&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBWnaOIUJdR7nUjphA2ZL7ZubRtgX9l9w4PrKVIHSq9aA&oe=66FFC307)

With light gameplay elements, the focus is on the narrative. Dive into a story-rich experience lasting 1-4 hours ‚è≥, climb rigging, explore moonlit cabins üåô, unearth hidden artefacts, and exercise your wit to become leader of the Red Flag Fleet.  

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031579_801519894943640_3850714342256227051_n.png?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=2HiVJgTM4s4Q7kNvgGltHgl&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDvcNDrfEr30HPtnEFk4MdXKQLOt_O_8s5qS8nw8Lwvvw&oe=66FFB5E6)

![{"height":231,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031400_1653444588750690_8451663376835143463_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=sjjVdXFcy10Q7kNvgEIJCgB&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDt4G8GMCTj4h9Ddlqaj6PSqn-o9gsV0H59xMHYTa9iWw&oe=66FFE258)

Celebrated for its cinematic story and historical environments, this non-combat experience has earned critical acclaim, winning the Tribeca Storyscapes Award (2023) & the Raindance Discovery Award (2021) üèÜ

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75322595_315227141608157_6664541123259039926_n.png?_nc_cat=104&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=hCZN9yA6inMQ7kNvgHPDt_u&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBM33byZjL11Gnp6tkNtgtwlStLmWwxLu_6cy4tG84LSw&oe=66FFDED9)


![{"height":225,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974820_419365674368364_6471370540204954427_n.png?_nc_cat=106&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=1AP3pbEDpdsQ7kNvgHL3nQH&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYANCd8pj0lIXs-RltqDrijZ4TfOUNMUiZmGoqUC5Lfv1g&oe=66FFC4F0)

Experience the captivating performance from Hollywood actress Lucy Liu üé≠, who brings Cheng Shih's character to life, under the direction of critically acclaimed filmmaker and creative director Eloise Singer üé¨


![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/57569455_779145490949371_5639970595016054333_n.png?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=bsmcD79-LCwQ7kNvgGcpqze&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYC0lCH_qRU-csqD_EvTu3rCORNaIG5g7RRhWehbNFAruA&oe=66FFE7AA)

![{"height":244,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75593949_1392764491611640_7662168618929982906_n.png?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=t8YA3_IEX0wQ7kNvgE25-8k&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCRc4DgbyBeqztS4xxOq-GtmLOCd7iiybailt5tTQDZLQ&oe=66FFC317)

Are you ready to turn the tides of history? Let's see how well you fare as The Pirate Queen! üè¥‚Äç‚ò†Ô∏èüëë



![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75251817_478868781249664_4666816330504461518_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=qQ8LAkCWVEAQ7kNvgFfANcx&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDzDTO5zPwUtlHTyLfFHawHzin1uHSivEf9tcvSas7PLw&oe=66FFDE8C)
